name: ALAssetRepresentation
desc: An ALAssetRepresentation object encapsulates one of the representations of a given ALAsset object.

items.name: func cgImage(options: [AnyHashable : Any]!) -> Unmanaged<CGImage>!
items.desc: Returns a full resolution CGImage of the representation.

items.name: func fullResolutionImage() -> Unmanaged<CGImage>!
items.desc: Returns a CGImage representation of the asset.

items.name: func fullScreenImage() -> Unmanaged<CGImage>!
items.desc: Returns a CGImage of the representation that is appropriate for displaying full screen.

items.name: func filename() -> String!
items.desc: Returns a string representing the filename of the representation on disk.

items.name: func size() -> Int64
items.desc: Returns the size in bytes of the file for the representation.

items.name: func getBytes(UnsafeMutablePointer<UInt8>!, fromOffset: Int64, length: Int, error: NSErrorPointer) -> Int
items.desc: Copies a specified range of bytes into a given buffer.

items.name: func metadata() -> [AnyHashable : Any]!
items.desc: Returns a dictionary of dictionaries of metadata for the representation.

items.name: func url() -> URL!
items.desc: Returns a persistent URL uniquely identifying the representation.
